[et_pb_section admin_label="section"][et_pb_row admin_label="row"][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text" background_layout="light" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_id="open-accordion-dance"]

Open Accordion and Dance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text" background_layout="light" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_id="open-tab-dance"]

Open Tab and Dance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label="Row"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text" background_layout="light" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

A whole bunch of text to more easily show the animation to the open accordion or tab.

All right stop, Collaborate and listen
Ice is back with my brand new invention
Something grabs a hold of me tightly
Flow like a harpoon daily and nightly
Will it ever stop? Yo, I don't know
Turn off the lights and I'll glow
To the extreme I rock a mic like a vandal
Light up a stage and wax a chump like a candle.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label="Row"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_accordion admin_label="Accordion" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_id="my-accordian"] [et_pb_accordion_item title="All right stop"]Collaborate and listen
Ice is back with my brand new invention
Something grabs a hold of me tightly
Flow like a harpoon daily and nightly
Will it ever stop? Yo, I don't know
Turn off the lights and I'll glow
To the extreme I rock a mic like a vandal
Light up a stage and wax a chump like a candle.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Dance"]go rush the speaker that booms
I'm killing your brain like a poisonous mushroom
Deadly, when I play a dope melody
Anything less than the best is a felony
Love it or leave it, you better gain way
You better hit bull's eye, the kid don't play[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title="Now that the party is jumping"]With the bass kicked in, and the Vegas are pumpin'
Quick to the point, to the point, no faking
Cooking MCs like a pound of bacon
Burning them they ain't quick and nimble
I go crazy when I hear a cymbal
And a hi hat with a souped up tempo
I'm on a roll and it's time to go solo[/et_pb_accordion_item] [/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label="Row"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_tabs admin_label="Tabs" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid" module_id="my-tabs"] [et_pb_tab title="All right stop" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]Collaborate and listen
Ice is back with my brand new invention
Something grabs a hold of me tightly
Flow like a harpoon daily and nightly
Will it ever stop? Yo, I don't know
Turn off the lights and I'll glow
To the extreme I rock a mic like a vandal
Light up a stage and wax a chump like a candle.[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="Dance" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]go rush the speaker that booms
I'm killing your brain like a poisonous mushroom
Deadly, when I play a dope melody
Anything less than the best is a felony
Love it or leave it, you better gain way
You better hit bull's eye, the kid don't play[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title="Now that the party is jumping" tab_font_select="default" tab_font="||||" tab_line_height="2em" tab_line_height_tablet="2em" tab_line_height_phone="2em" body_font_select="default" body_font="||||" body_line_height="2em" body_line_height_tablet="2em" body_line_height_phone="2em"]With the bass kicked in, and the Vegas are pumpin'
Quick to the point, to the point, no faking

I go crazy when I hear a cymbal
And a hi hat with a souped up tempo
I'm on a roll and it's time to go solo[/et_pb_tab] [/et_pb_tabs][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label="Row"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text admin_label="Text" background_layout="light" text_orientation="left" use_border_color="off" border_color="#ffffff" border_style="solid"]

A whole bunch of text to more easily show the animation to the open accordion or tab.

Dance, go rush the speaker that booms
I'm killing your brain like a poisonous mushroom
Deadly, when I play a dope melody
Anything less than the best is a felony
Love it or leave it, you better gain way
You better hit bull's eye, the kid don't play

If there was a problem, yo, I'll solve it
Check out the hook while my DJ revolves it

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
